Windows.name: Windows
Windows.requirements: Windows 10 (version 1607) or newer (Intel or AMD processors only)
Windows.items_added:
(GPU) Updated the list of NVIDIA, Intel, and AMD HW devices (PM-2138)
(Library) Added Folder Location filter for Movie, Episode, Track and Photo library views (PM-1739)
(Web) Updated to 4.141.0
Windows.items_fixed:
(Android) Fix regression for fix which addressed Nvidia Shield devices to crash periodically (PM-2054)
(Library) Edition titles were not being saved to the database correctly (PM-2474)
(Library) In some cases library items were not properly sorted (PM-2106)
(Library) Items would be removed from library if mount point became unavailable (PM-2460)
(Livetv) Transcoding mpeg2 livetv streams would fail on windows (PM-2241)
(Music) Sonic Analysis would not trigger correctly for new albums after a scan (PM-2486)
(Subtitles) Chinese subtitles were not correctly burnt in on MacOS 15 (PM-2168)
(Transcoder) Expat has been updated to 2.6.4, fixes CVE-2022-22822 (PM-2454)
(ViewStateSync) An exception could cause VSS to stop working
